concept.title: Disabling Log Data for a Log Agent on the OpenStack Platform

section.p: To disable the collection of specific log data that is no longer needed in the configuration of a Log Agent, you have to delete the corresponding entries in the agent.conf configuration file.

note.p: The following step-by-step description refers to a Log Agent that you have installed on an OpenStack node. It is assumed that there is no need to disable log data for the Log Agent used for monitoring itself.
